content: is there such a thing as  Steam wishlist -> cheapshark?

Yes, there is a feature called Steam Wishlist Import on the CheapShark website. It allows users to import their Steam Wishlist directly onto CheapShark, which is a price comparison website for video games. Once imported, CheapShark will track the prices of the games on your wishlist and notify you when they go on sale or when there are price drops. This feature helps users find the best deals for the games they have on their Steam Wishlist.
